Events that occurred on 5 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1918 - Actor Alan Tilvern is born.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mr Britten.
2003 - "The Return of the King", the seventh set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, is released.
2003 - The Lord of the Rings: Weapons and Warfare is published.
2015 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: The Art of War is published.
2019 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Minas Morgul expansion is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
